member.name: Brush.Clone
member.summary: The Brush.Clone method creates a newBrush object based on this brush.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the newBrush object.

member.name: Brush.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The Brush.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates the nature of thisBrush object's most recent method failure.

returns.para: The Brush.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration.
If no methods invoked on thisBrush object have failed since the previous call to Brush.GetLastStatus, then Brush.GetLastStatus returns Ok.

If at least one method invoked on thisBrush object has failed since the previous call to Brush.GetLastStatus, then Brush.GetLastStatus returns a value that indicates the nature of the most recent failure.

member.name: Brush.GetType
member.summary: The Brush.GetType method gets the type of this brush.
member.returns: This method returns the type of this brush. The value returned is one of the elements of the enumeration.
